languages.text: "Ищите безумца. Только псих будет калечить труп после смерти".
"Look for a lunatic. Only a madman would butcher a corpse in this way."
languages.original_text: "Ищите безумца. Только псих будет калечить труп после смерти".

traits.locale_text: "Look for a lunatic. Only a madman would butcher a corpse this way."
"Look for a lunatic. Only a madman would butcher a corpse this way."
"Look for a lunatic. Only a madman would butcher a corpse in this way."
"Look for a lunatic. Only a madman would butcher a corpse in this way."
"Look for a lunatic. Only a madman would butcher a corpse in this way."
"Look for a lunatic. Only a madman would butcher a corpse in this way."
"Look for a lunatic. Only a madman would butcher a corpse in this way."

languages.text: "Sucht einen Verrückten. Nur ein Wahnsinniger, würde eine Leiche so zurichten."
languages.original_text: "Look for a lunatic. Only a madman would butcher a corpse in this way."

traits.locale_text: "Sucht einen Verrückten. Nur ein Wahnsinniger, würde eine Leiche so zurichten."

languages.text: « Cherchez un fou, alors. Seul un dément massacrerait un cadavre de la sorte. »
languages.original_text: "Look for a lunatic. Only a madman would butcher a corpse in this way."

traits.locale_text: « Cherchez un fou, alors. Seul un dément massacrerait un cadavre de la sorte. »

languages.text: «Buscamos a un lunático. Solo alguien demente mutilaría así un cadáver».
languages.original_text: "Look for a lunatic. Only a madman would butcher a corpse in this way."

traits.locale_text: «Buscamos a un lunático. Solo alguien demente mutilaría así un cadáver».

languages.text: 「狂人を探せ。こんな風に死体を切り刻もうとするのは狂った人間だけだ」
languages.original_text: "Look for a lunatic. Only a madman would butcher a corpse in this way."

traits.locale_text: 「狂人を探せ。こんな風に死体を切り刻もうとするのは狂った人間だけだ」

languages.text: “要找的人是个疯子，只有疯子才会这么残害尸体。”
languages.original_text: "Look for a lunatic. Only a madman would butcher a corpse in this way."

traits.locale_text: “要找的人是个疯子，只有疯子才会这么残害尸体。”

languages.text: "Aklını kaybetmiş birini arayın. Ancak delinin teki, bir cesedi böylesine kesip biçebilir."
languages.original_text: "Look for a lunatic. Only a madman would butcher a corpse in this way."
